  ✖ br is a void element tag and must not have children.

    <br className={'dont-remove-class'}>invalid children</br>
    ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

  ℹ Recommended fix

    1   │ - <br className={"dont-remove-class"}>
    2   │ -   invalid children
    3   │ - </br>
      1 │ + <br className={"dont-remove-class"} />
